phrases: It is the same as that day...
Yano's heart is about to open up to me...
So that is how it was...
Understanding the importance of this step forward, we can look even further ahead.
We will just keep looking forward.
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
Are you really sure about this?
When you say yeah like that... did you really think this over?
Sure you are not just getting caught in the flow of things?
Well, I just could not leave him alone anymore.
You really did just get caught in the flow again.
Now that I have decided to start over, I am going to see it through.
Well... if you are that determined, we will still cheer you on.
Whoa, what is up with that?
Did those two hook up again?
Hey, any of you guys free tomorrow?
I am holding a hook-up party.
I just cannot get enough guys to come.
Ah, do not bother asking him.
His type never goes to hook-up parties.
Want To meet at the usual place tomorrow?
I will call you when I leave.
Yano's going to come over for the first time in a while.
I think I will get Mom pick to up some cake.
But I want to believe that those days will become something incredibly irreplaceable.
What time will you be back?
Ah, no... it can wait for another time.
Um... yeah, just heading out for a bit.
I am heading for a bit, too.
Do not sit next to me!
They probably already have the wrong idea since we got on the bus together!
You sure know how to make things awkward.
I could say the same to you.
Everything went well between you and Takahashi, did not it?
You are going on a date today, are not you?
Why cannot you even tell me that much?
Are you trying to keep your guard up?
You have been like this since middle school.
And do not give me the whole apology routine, either.
It will only piss me off more.
You went and told me I would regret it, declared war, and put me though hell.
That is why I tied you up and tore apart any chance I saw you having.
But you are just going to bench yourself in the middle of the game?
Why do I have to be the one telling you this?
And just so you know, I am not watching out for you or anything, hear me?
I am just changing buses here.
You are going to a hook-up party, are not you?
After all, Takeuchi's busy getting to his hook-up party.
As promised, neither of us are watching out for each other, right?
Good luck with that hook-up party.
Yano, you weirdo... getting entangled with him like that.
He is the one who started it.
You really like Takeuchi-kun a whole lot, do not you?
Do not say sick stuff like that, you moron!
I am only speaking the truth.
Should I go get us something to drink?
Yano, you are pretty serious today.
You always screw around, and we never get any studying done.
You do not have to push yourself...
It might be because I am actually nervous.
I just feel like I might screw up by accident and make you angry again...
I would not say something like that...
I have decided that I want to start over.
That is why it is okay to act stupid like usual...
When you are so obedient and quiet like this, it makes me queasy.
It is true that it might have just been impulsive...
I realized that I have been waiting for that impulse all along.
I like going to those stone-slab baths!
Ah... I am running to the bathroom for a sec.
It is on your left down there.
So what is all this about?
Stone-slab baths are in fashion now?
Anyone else who thinks they can flip, feel free to do so!
The bear's gym classes are always a little crazy...
I am drained... and besides, are not you guys hungry?
Do you have any energy left?
Oh man, all the girls are watching.
He is never gotten better than a grade of 5 in gym before!
He always gets so hyped when there is an audience...
Damn... he is sure standing out.
It is got nothing to do with me.
Take, you are not going to give it a shot?
Nope, it is such a pain.
After all, you would look so lame when you screw up.
Well, do not push yourself or anything.
Is not this kind of unusual?
I guess I can handle this much, at least.
You can really feel his intensity.
Are you going to spin this time?
It looks like he is going to try to spin!
The word impossible is not in this man's dictionary!
Look at those two crazy guys!
Is it going to be a 540 next?!
As to be expected, the teacher eventually stopped them.
Ow, geez... my hip hurts like hell.
I thought you settled things, so why are you still at each other's throats?
He is the one at my throat.
It is weird that he is still at it, huh?
Today's gym class was so much fun!
Why am I grinning so much about this?
Makes you wonder if there is anything Yano's not good at.
Something he is not good at...
Is there anything he is not good at?
When I first entered high school, that is the question I asked him...
Back then, Yano was so scary to me...
Now that I think back on it, it is kind of mysterious.
But... he really did look like someone who could do anything back then.
Whenever you are uneasy about something, you tend to get even more uneasy about it the more it is brought up.
Even Yano, who jumps over the vaulting horse so easily, is no different.
And when I think of that...
Hey, I noticed this before... your lunches are always packed with whole lot of stuff, huh?
Yeah, it is completely different from the lunches my mom makes.
She always just uses last night's leftovers or something.
It is not as tasty as it looks.
It is not that good, right?
Compared to how it looks, it is fairly plain.
She does not have much of a sense for cooking.
But she tries her best, so I overlook that.
I think her omelets are pretty good, though.
Or, well... they are the only part that is good.
You told me that someone can only have one person most important to them at a time.
If you are going to say that, then I am going to try my best.
As long as you do not give up on me, I will never give up on you.
You have been home all weekend, and you have been coming straight home from school lately, too.
I thought this might or might not be the case, but I guess everything fell though with that girl?
It has nothing to do with you!
How can I still call you my little brother?
Take advantage of that little runt's mistakes once in a while, would you?
Hey... what is it mean to fight to the bitter end in love?
Well... it varies depending on the situation, but...
If nothing changes whether you confess or not...
No matter how much sugar you coat your words with, they will still leave a bad aftertaste when everything's said and done.
Even if you get over it, the people around you will still have to deal with the situation.
If someone is honest and open like that, he is just being egotistical.
Getting into an illicit relationship with your best friend's girlfriend is wrong to begin with.
Even though you and Moto are both in 11 th grade, you are completely different.
Of course you would lose to him like this.
What do you mean by that?
That girl told me she would form bonds, even if there was nothing to work with.
Would it have been better to cut into his plans and get her before he did?
Even if I had to tie him up?
In the first place, the world of love is all about being partial and biased.
There is no such thing as fair and unfair, dishonorable and honorable.
Even if you set him up and break his arm, if you are fighting with all your might for yourself...
Loving someone else's lover, or stealing someone else's love...
There is only one way to allow such a thing.
If you cannot figure it out, you do not have the right to do such a thing.
I never would have thought you would be part of the student council, Takeuchi-kun.
Did not you participate last semester?
They kind of pushed me into doing it again...
It is nothing out of the ordinary, though.
Ah, no one's sitting next to me, so why do not you sit here?
Since we have never had a class together, sitting next to each other sorta feels mysterious, huh?
I was just thinking the same thing.
Reading too much into this coincidence would be weird.
I will talk to him normally.
By the way, how did things go the other day?
I am glad everything worked out.
Yeah... sorry for causing you so much trouble...
Just like you said, I think I was the one obsessing over Nana-san.
And because of that, Yano had a lot of uneasy feelings.
Which is why it is my turn to give it my all.
You really are best like this...
No matter what happens, I want him to keep smiling.
And I want to make him smile.
Because it is what keeps me so full of spirit.
What I said was not a lie, but...
If it was really for me...
Did you prepare for your presentation?
I just do not know what you are thinking sometimes.
I guess not all girls are babes when they get rid of their glasses like in comics...
The one way... the only way...
What is the only way to allow it?!
We are going to another hook-up party.
I cannot figure it out at all!
I have got a lot of cuties this time!
I just said I was not going!
Even though it seems like our lives never change, they slowly do...
And just like how we never notice...
Kono kokoro wo hiyasu you ni
Yasashiii ushirosugata mawari iku kono omoi
Kimi ga mitsumeru saki ni wa
Kono kokoro wo nadameru you ni
Boku ga motomer saki ni wa
But it continues to fall, without actually hitting me
as if it is trying to freeze my heart instead.
I have always found your gentle back
on any day, but where do my
and we seem like we are going to reach, but do not.
At that distance away from you.
will pour all around and spread
as if it is meant to soothe my heart.
I am always looking at your cute back
point me in the other direction.
at the end of my search?
and we seem like we are going to reach, but do not.
At that distance away from you.
At that distance away from you.
At that distance away from you.
At that distance away from you.
Let us try going out for just a month.
Do not go out with some girl you do not even like!
I do not want to hear that from you.
I want to hurry and become an adult...
If only... there were such a thing as eternity.
